title: PhoneticFilterFactory doesn't handle maxCodeLength param
description: An exception is thrown when the maxCodeLength attribute is used on PhoneticFilterFactory.

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content:
Attaching patch.
Both the name lookup via reflection of setMaxCodeLen and the arguments it took were incorrect.

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content: committed since the patch is an obvious improvement, but I'll  leave this issue open a while for further review since I'm not familiar with these classes.
